avalancheActivity.highlights: Rather little snow remains in the mountains, and it has melted and settled due to the recent warm weather and rain. Most of the snow that fell last week is now located in gullies.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Rather little snow remains in the mountains, and it has melted and settled due to the recent warm weather and rain. Most of the snow that fell last week is now located in gullies. Naturally released avalanches are not expected, but people could trigger small sluffs in steep terrain

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæglætis veður, NA-átt bjart og úrkomulítið.

avalancheActivity.comment: A small avalanche fell above Flateyri, detected by an avalancheradar, on 31 October.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow cover is different between fjords. Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are possible windslabs in southerly aspects high in starting zones and just below ridges. The snow is expected to subside and gain strength next days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow cover is different between fjords. Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are possible windslabs in southerly aspects high in starting zones and just below ridges. The snow is expected to subside and gain strength next days.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlæg átt og úrkomulaust, vægt frost til fjalla en hægt hlýnandi veður og mögulega frostlaust til fjalla um helgina.

avalancheActivity.comment: No recent reports but a small dry loose avalanche fell in Hrafnaskál in Ólafsfjörðru on Tuesday 28th Oktober. On the 29th October and avalanche fell by the Siglufjörður road and 3 avalanches fell on the 30th above road Ólafsfjaraðrvegur, none of the reaching the road.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow left in mountains but some snow in highest mountains that is considered generally stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The new snow from last week has mostly melted, especially in lower part of mountains. Snow remaining in the mountains has subsided and should become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg austanátt en hvassara á annesjum. Úrkomulítið og áfram frostlaust á láglendi en vægt frost til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.comment: Few small avalanches were reported last week that fell during rain and warm weather.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is found in gullies and depressions, while ridges are bare. The snow has subsided and gone through melt/freeze cycles. Only small sluffs are expected but new windslabs could form high in the mountains on Friday

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow is found in gullies and depressions, while ridges are bare. The snow has subsided and gone through melt/freeze cycles. Only small sluffs are expected but new windslabs could form high in the mountains on Friday that could become unstable at first

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæglætis veður eða hæg norðlæg átt og úrkomulítið á fimmtudag. Vaxandi NA-átt með rigningu á láglendi og neðri hluta fjalla en snjókomu efst í fjöllum
